subject: Re: My mistruths...
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Even I wouldn't recommend this for kids. Maybe 15 years old or more, 
and only on their volition, that is only if they had an interest. 

 I can't work with Mr. Moon, I do not agree with his "theories" about 
the paranormal, or how the box works. I would be willing to discuss 
it, but I'm not going to be told how it is. I don't think there is a 
danger, other than suggestion, which members of this society are 
really good at giving themselves. 

 As far as "testing" all I can ask is ---Why!? This stuff is highly 
subjective, I know what I hear, and I know it works, I know I get 
meanningful messages. Others won't hear what I hear --a test is 
meaningless!

 I think we create all this stuff, voices, hauntings--everything. 
 
 Frank-S
